channel.title: Anyone willing to help?
channel.description:
i have my website www.google.com and its a really short site about runescape.
but if you have any content you can help me add than let me know.
and also help me out by clicking the google ads please.
i dont wanna spam but i need hits.

item.title: Anyone willing to help?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

You must get permission from a global moderator or admin in order to advertise your website.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone willing to help?
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

well, for a start you should get a new banner.
Also if i were you i would have a shorter domain, that is somewhat easier to remember.

I suppose you are trying to make a site kinda like tip.it or runehq, in that case you will have to add something that they do not have, because no one will bother coming to your site if you just provide them whit exactly the same shit.
So try to come up whit stuff that they do not cover or offer. Maybe a site devoted to guides on how to defeat various monsters. i know tip.it have some of those, but last time i checked it was only around 3 or 4 guides. And there are already TONS of sites whit different money making guides/tips, so i will not suggest to have that unless is some really good tips.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone willing to help?
item.dc:creator: @mendezcool15 mendezcool15
item.description:
@mendezcool15 wrote:

ok give me ideas and i will.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone willing to help?
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

What a retarded site.
you should redesign the whole thing.

Runescape is very different than real life (obviously). In runescape, you will find that whatever you say will not be taken seriously at first. If you ask someone to be your runescape friend, they might assume you?re a moocher and only talking because you?re after their runescape items.
lol wut?

Read full topic
